name: Riktam Technologies
description:
(Visit our website to request a quote for your project)
How Riktam Technologies can help you
- Experience: You benefit from our extensive experience developing mobility products and solutions. We have developed over 200 apps for iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows phone. You focus on the big idea, we will take care of the nitty gritties.
- Reliability: Our processes are ISO standard compliant so that you get a very reliable project delivery and experience.
- Cost: Our development center is based in India; this helps us keep the costs down and thus provide services for a reasonable fee. Ask us for a quote!
- Under one roof: Multiple technology teams - so that you get all the related services under one roof. Backend CMS, payment integration, web services, etc
- Partner mentality: Our people are groomed to suggest alternatives and use their expertise to guide you on all aspects of your project.
